articles.author: Business Standard
articles.title: Strengthen routine immunisation, focus on unvaccinated children: WHO - Business Standard
articles.description: The World Health Organisation (WHO) on Monday called for focused efforts to provide life-saving vaccines to nearly 4.6 million unvaccinated children in Southeast Asia as countries intensify efforts to equal or surpass pre-Covid vaccination coverage levels.

articles.title: Eddies: Circular Currents And Their Influence On World's Hottest Ocean - Eurasia Review
articles.description: Water from the Pacific Ocean flows into the Indian Ocean via the Indonesia Archipelago Seas thanks to a vast network of currents dubbed the Indonesian Throughflow (ITF). The ITF acts as a heat and …
